entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. 60 percent chance of showers over northern sections early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the Coastal mountains this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:25 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:25 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. 40 percent chance of flurries over southern sections in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:25 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
